post:
Hello members of LES!

We're currently offering a bandwidth special on our San Jose and Chicago servers, along with discounts on some of our Chicago based servers. Offers below!

We're also pleased to present the launch of our new blog! Visit us at https://blog.xenspec.com.
View our other offerings at https://xenspec.com.

Our support team is ready to assist with any questions, we're always happy to help!

 &nbsp;

--Test Our Network--

 &nbsp;

--Support Services--

In need of support? Our team is standing by to assist! We're reachable through our ticketing system, our website's Live Chat, and email at support@xenspec.com

Our dedicated servers are unmanaged, however we will try to make every attempt to help with any issues that may arise. If we're not able to assist with a certain issue, we'll certainly get you pointed in the right direction. All hardware and network issues are fully covered, custom software and certain operating system issues will be our best effort.

For out-of-band access and reboot capabilities, we offer proxied IPMI access through our portal. This ensures that the IPMI interface is always secure, and is not accessible when not in use. Creating a session and logging into IPMI can be done within our customer portal, under the service you wish to connect to.

 &nbsp;

Thank you!
